title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7205.7 - Annual report
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 7205.7 - Annual report

State Regulations

On or before the 15th day of February of each year, the
chief administrative officer of a facility, which detained eligible inmates in
the previous year pursuant to an agreement, shall forward a written report to
the commission setting forth: (a) a
description of each agreement; and
(b) the number of inmates confined pursuant
to each agreement. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
7205.7

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
